title: Chick-Fil-A Founder Credited His Success To Christian Principles
teaser: The founder of the popular Chick-fil-A restaurant chain, S. Truett Cathy, died on Monday at the age of 93. Cathy was as well-known for his chicken sandwich as for his Christian values.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
